tech-support.title: Tech Support
tech-support.p1: At Alton Computer Solutions, we believe in providing good old-fashioned tech support. Whether you need help on-site, remotely, or over the phone, our team is ready to assist. We are here, in your community, providing boots-on-the-ground support whenever you need it.

features.title: Hardware Repairs
features.content: We replace faulty power supplies, swap out old hard drives, and set up new computers or printers.

features.title: Software Troubleshooting
features.content: We resolve issues with software like Outlook, Adobe, and more.

features.title: Networking Fixes
features.content: Our team addresses pesky network issues to keep your systems running smoothly.

tech-support.p2: For reliable, hands-on tech support, Alton Computer Solutions is your trusted partner, ready to tackle any IT issue with expertise and care.

networking.title: Networking
networking.p1: Need networking support? Alton Computer Solutions provides a comprehensive range of networking services designed to ensure your business stays connected and efficient. Unlike many IT service providers, we are here, locally present, and ready to come on-site to fix your networking issues.

features.title: Network Equipment and Setup
features.content: We supply and configure network switches, routers, racks, and wireless systems to ensure seamless connectivity.

features.title: Troubleshooting and Maintenance
features.content: Our team is ready to diagnose and resolve network issues promptly, minimizing downtime.

features.title: Customized Solutions
features.content: We tailor our networking services to fit the unique requirements of your business, whether it’s a small office or a large enterprise.

networking.p2: At Alton Computer Solutions, we understand the importance of a reliable network in powering your business operations. Trust us to keep you connected.

managed-it-plans.title: Managed IT Plans
managed-it-plans.p1: Managing IT infrastructure is crucial for business success. Alton Computer Solutions offers flexible Basic and Premium Managed IT Plans that cater to businesses of all sizes. As your local IT partner, we’re here to provide on-site support when needed, ensuring your systems are always in top shape.

features.title: Workstation and Server Management
features.content: We provide monitoring, maintenance, and security for your devices.

features.title: Cloud Services Integration
features.content: Our plans include Microsoft 365 services to optimize collaboration and productivity.

features.title: Network and Cloud Management
features.content: We handle the management of your routers, firewalls, and Wi-Fi systems, so you can focus on your business.

managed-it-plans.p2: Let Alton Computer Solutions take the stress out of IT management, so you can focus on growing your business.

hybrid-cloud-migrations.title: Hybrid Cloud Migrations
hybrid-cloud-migrations.p1: Many businesses require a mix of on-premises and cloud solutions. Alton Computer Solutions specializes in setting up and maintaining hybrid cloud environments, integrating on-site servers with cloud systems for optimal performance and security.

features.title: On-Premises Server Setup and Maintenance
features.content: For businesses handling highly sensitive data, we ensure your on-site servers operate seamlessly.

features.title: Cloud Integration
features.content: We link less sensitive data to secure cloud platforms, creating a balanced and efficient hybrid environment.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.content: Our hybrid cloud solutions are designed to deliver the best of both worlds—local control and cloud scalability.

hybrid-cloud-migrations.p2: Alton Computer Solutions bridges the gap between on-premises and cloud systems, ensuring your hybrid environment runs smoothly and efficiently, so your business thrives.

firewall.title: Firewalls with VPN
firewall.p1: Protecting your business from cyber threats is essential, and our firewall solutions are designed to provide robust security. Alton Computer Solutions is here to recommend, implement, and maintain firewalls that best suit your business needs and internet speeds.

features.title: Subscription-Based Security
features.content: Firewalls with built-in services to prevent viruses and malware.

features.title: Internet Traffic Monitoring
features.content: We monitor data traffic to and from your business, ensuring safe connections.

features.title: VPN Setup and Management
features.content: We offer point-to-point and client VPN solutions for secure remote access.

firewall.p2: With Alton Computer Solutions, you can rest assured your business is protected from cyber threats with reliable, tailored firewall solutions.

cybersecurity.title: Cybersecurity and Compliance
cybersecurity.p1: Cybersecurity is more critical than ever. Alton Computer Solutions helps businesses identify and address security vulnerabilities.

features.title: Security Controls Implementation
features.content: We review and implement the necessary measures to secure your business.

features.title: CISA and CSET Assessments
features.content: Identify, protect, detect, respond, and recover with our detailed evaluations and remediation plans.

features.title: Cybersecurity Performance Goals
features.content: We provide CISA’s CPG assessment and checklist to help you stay compliant and secure.

cybersecurity.p2: Partner with Alton Computer Solutions for cybersecurity solutions that not only protect your business but also ensure compliance with industry standards.

backup.title: Backup and Disaster Recovery Plans
backup.p1: Data loss can cripple a business. At Alton Computer Solutions, we provide fully managed backup and disaster recovery solutions to protect your critical data. With our local presence, we ensure hands-on support to keep your backups healthy and reliable.

features.title: Comprehensive Protection
features.content: Safeguard data stored on workstations, servers, and the cloud through Microsoft 365.

features.title: Continuous Monitoring and Testing
features.content: We regularly monitor and test backups to ensure data integrity and readiness for recovery.

features.title: Ransomware Protection
features.content: Our solutions are designed to prevent data loss due to ransomware attacks.

backup.p2: When it comes to protecting your business data, trust Alton Computer Solutions to deliver peace of mind through proactive backup and disaster recovery planning.

automation.title: Automation and Integration
automation.p1: We offer custom software solutions tailored to your business needs. Alton Computer Solutions specializes in developing software that streamlines your operations, enhances productivity, and provides a competitive edge in the market.

features.title: Automation
features.content: We use scripts, Power Automate and custom programs to automate repetitive, time-consuming tasks.

features.title: Integrate
features.content: Integrate different workflows, sites, and systems to create a seamless business environment.

automation.p2: Alton Computer Solutions is your go-to partner for custom software solutions that drive business growth and success.
